description: Archaeologists in El Salvador have unearthed 2,400-year-old ceramic puppets with expressive faces atop a pyramid. The figurines, featuring movable heads, were likely used in public rituals to depict historical or mythical events. The discovery challenges the belief that ancient El Salvador was culturally isolated, linking its traditions to broader Central American networks. Similar artifacts found in Guatemala further support the theory of shared traditions among regional elites. Other items at the site, including jade pendants, indicate extensive cultural and trade connections.
title: 2,400-Year-Old Puppets with Expressive Faces Discovered in El Salvador

description: India’s Aditya-L1 mission has achieved a historic milestone with its Solar Ultra-violet Imaging Telescope (SUIT) capturing the first-ever solar flare kernel in the near-ultraviolet spectrum. This unprecedented observation confirms energy transfer across different layers of the Sun's atmosphere, advancing the understanding of solar flares and space weather. The findings, published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters, open new avenues in solar physics, enhancing the ability to study solar activity from space.
title: Aditya-L1’s SUIT Telescope Captures First-Ever Solar Flare Kernel, Revealing Unseen Solar Activity

description: A study proposes that Alpha Centauri could be contributing a significant number of asteroids to the solar system. Simulations indicate that around 50 objects from the neighboring star system may enter the Oort Cloud annually. While most pass through due to their high velocity, a few could travel inward. The frequency of such occurrences is expected to rise over the next 28,000 years. Scientists are now focused on identifying interstellar objects to compare them with native solar system materials.
title: Alpha Centauri May Have Sent Millions of Asteroids into the Solar System

description: Intuitive Machines' Athena lunar lander has successfully landed near the Moon’s south pole as part of NASA’s IM-2 mission. Launched aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, the lander aims to explore lunar resources and test new technologies, including NASA’s PRIME-1 water ice experiment and Nokia’s 4G network. The exact condition of Athena remains under assessment, with mission controllers working to determine its orientation. A press conference is scheduled to provide updates on its status and planned operations before lunar nightfall.
title: Athena Lunar Lander Successfully Lands Near Moon’s South Pole on IM-2 Mission

description: A new study questions the existence of black hole singularities, suggesting refinements to Einstein’s equations using quantum gravity concepts. Researchers argue that infinite density points may not be real, replacing them with highly curved but finite regions of space-time. While direct observation remains difficult, gravitational waves and early universe studies could provide evidence. This research could reshape how black holes and cosmic evolution are understood.
title: Black Hole Singularities May Not Exist, Say Scientists

description: Enceladus, one of Saturn’s most intriguing moons, has long been thought to have water plumes erupting from its underground ocean. However, a recent study proposes an alternative explanation, suggesting the plumes may originate from a semi-liquid layer within the moon’s ice shell. Researchers believe shear heating along fractures creates slushy, salt-laden reservoirs near the surface, challenging previous assumptions. This new perspective raises fresh questions about the habitability of Enceladus and the mechanisms driving its geysers. Further investigation is needed to confirm these findings.
title: Enceladus' Geysers May Not Come from Underground Ocean, Study Suggests

description: ISRO has successfully conducted a hot test for the semi-cryogenic SE2000 engine, a crucial step in enhancing future heavy-lift space missions. The Power Head Test Article (PHTA) validated key engine subsystems, including the gas generator, turbo pumps, and pre-burner. The new propulsion system, using liquid oxygen and kerosene, offers improved efficiency and stability. With ongoing research in reusable launch vehicles and higher payload capacities, ISRO is making significant advancements in spaceflight technology.
title: ISRO Successfully Tests Semi-Cryogenic Engine for Future Heavy-Lift Launches

description: Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX is set to premiere on April 8, 2025, as the latest addition to the iconic Gundam franchise. The anime follows Amate Yuzuriha, a high school student who gets drawn into the underground world of mobile suit dueling. The return of the Red Gundam and its mysterious pilot, Shuji Ito, adds further intrigue to the story. Directed by Kazuya Tsurumaki and produced by Sunrise and Studio Khara, the series will be available for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX OTT Release: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: NASA’s SPHEREx and PUNCH missions, originally set for February 27, have faced another delay. The launch, previously rescheduled for March 4, is now expected to take place on March 7 at 10:09 p.m. EST from Vandenberg Space Force Base, California. NASA cited scheduling constraints at the Western Range as the reason for the latest postponement. The missions will launch aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, with SPHEREx focused on infrared space mapping and PUNCH studying solar activity, including coronal mass ejections.
title: NASA Reschedules SPHEREx and PUNCH Missions, Now Set for March 7 Launch

description: NASA’s Lunar Trailblazer, launched on 26 February, has lost communication and is running low on power. The spacecraft, meant to detect water ice on the moon, has been unable to perform key trajectory corrections. Ground controllers are using the Deep Space Network and observatories to assess its position, but recovery remains uncertain. The mission, part of NASA’s SIMPLEx programme, was developed to conduct cost-effective lunar exploration. Efforts continue to restore contact and salvage the mission.
title: NASA’s Lunar Trailblazer Moon Probe Struggles with Power and Signal Loss

description: Astronomers have detected ZTF J0112+5827, a newly identified polar cataclysmic variable. This binary system, composed of a white dwarf and a low-mass donor star, features an 80.9-minute orbital period and a strong magnetic field of 38.7 MG. It lacks an accretion disk, with emissions mainly from its accretion stream and magnetic field lines. The system is located approximately 1,186 light-years away and has been noted as a potential future source of gravitational waves, which could be detected by the LISA mission planned for 2035.
title: New Polar Cataclysmic Variable Identified by Astronomers: What You Need to Know

description: Fateh, starring Sonu Sood and Jacqueline Fernandez, is now streaming on JioCinema. The film, which revolves around an ex-special operations officer battling cybercrime, was released in theatres on 10 January. It earned Rs. 26.86 crore at the box office and received mixed reviews. The movie also features Naseeruddin Shah, Vijay Raaz, and Dibyendu Bhattacharya in key roles. The OTT release was announced on 6 March, giving audiences another chance to watch this action-packed thriller.
title: Sonu Sood’s Fateh Now Available for Streaming on JioHotstar

description: SpaceX launched its eighth Starship test flight from Starbase, Texas, on March 6. While the Super Heavy booster executed a successful landing and was caught by the launch tower arms, the upper stage suffered multiple engine failures and was lost mid-flight. This marked the second consecutive test where the upper stage failed to complete its trajectory. Investigations are ongoing as SpaceX works on refining its systems for future missions. The company has sought approval for 25 Starship launches in 2025.
title: SpaceX Starship Flight 8: Booster Caught, Upper Stage Lost Again in Mid-Flight

description: Nemsia Studios has released the official trailer for Suky, an action drama exploring underground Dambe boxing. Directed by Ola Cardoso, the film follows a man seeking redemption through brutal fights inside a notorious prison. Starring James Damilare, Tobi Bakare, and Femi Adebayo, Suky blends intense action with emotional depth. Set to premiere on March 7 exclusively on Prime Video, the film promises a gripping cinematic experience.
title: Suky OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Telugu drama Utsavam, featuring Dilip Prakash and Regina Cassandra, is now streaming on SUN NXT. Released theatrically on September 13, 2024, the film highlights the struggles of theatre artists in a modern world. Directed by Arjun Sai, the movie has received praise for its engaging narrative and performances. The story follows Krishna, a passionate artist striving to revive Surabhi Natakalu. Viewers can now watch the film online and experience its emotional depth.
title: Utsavam is Now Streaming on SUN NXT: Everything You Need to Know

description: The vernal equinox 2025 is set for March 20 at 09:01 UTC, marking the astronomical start of spring in the Northern Hemisphere and autumn in the Southern Hemisphere. This event occurs due to Earth’s axial tilt aligning with its orbit, resulting in nearly equal hours of daylight and night across the globe. While the equinox does not bring perfectly equal day and night, slight variations occur due to atmospheric refraction and the sun’s size.
title: Vernal Equinox 2025: Date, Time, and the Science Behind the Event

description: The world’s largest iceberg, A23a, has run aground near South Georgia, a key wildlife haven. Scientists are monitoring its impact on marine life, particularly on penguins and seals, as it could disrupt feeding routes. Some experts suggest the iceberg may also enhance ocean productivity by releasing nutrients. If it fragments, it may pose risks to fishing activities. Researchers continue to study its effects on the region’s ecosystem in the coming months.
title: World’s Largest Iceberg A23a Grounds Near South Georgia, Raising Wildlife and Environmental Concerns

description: Mistral introduced the Mistral Optical Character Recognition (OCR) application programming interface (API) on Thursday. The artificial intelligence (AI) model is capable of analysing and processing PDF documents and converting it into an AI-ready text format such as Markdown or raw text file. The tool is capable of extracting data from PDFs to make them digestible for AI models.
title: Mistral Introduces New OCR API That Can Convert PDF Documents Into AI-Ready Format

description: Realme Narzo 80x 5G may launch in India soon as a successor to the Realme Narzo 70x 5G, which was unveiled in the country in April 2024. A recent report has suggested some key details about the purported handset including its possible RAM, storage and colour options. Previous reports have claimed that the company is working on Realme Narzo 80 Pro and Realme Narzo 80 Ultra variants as well.
title: Realme Narzo 80x 5G India Variant RAM, Storage Configurations and Colour Options Leaked

description: US President Donald Trump has signed an executive order establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and a separate crypto stockpile. These reserves will be funded exclusively with crypto assets seized during federal investigations, rather than using taxpayer money to acquire new tokens.
title: Donald Trump Establishes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, Crypto Stockpile Utilising Seized Assets

description: The Indian Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) launched several artificial intelligence (AI) initiatives on Thursday. The announcements were made on the occasion of the first anniversary of the IndiaAI Mission, which is on March 7. Union IT minister Ashwini Vaishnaw unveiled the India AI Compute Portal during an event, which will provide accessible and affordable AI compute, network, storage, platform, and cloud services.
title: Indian Government Launches AI Compute Portal, Dataset Repository AIKosha to Boost Innovation

description: Poco F7 Ultra is expected to launch soon in select global markets alongside the Poco F7 Pro. The handsets are tipped to be rebranded versions of the Redmi K80 Pro and the base Redmi K80, respectively, which were unveiled in China in November 2024. The Ultra variant has now been spotted on the Geekbench AI benchmarking platform with Qualcomm's latest flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Poco F7 Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Spotted on Geekbench AI

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds FE 2 is in development as the successor to 2023's Galaxy Buds FE, according to a report. The purported true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds are expected to replace the original Buds FE as the South Korean technology conglomerate's most affordable offering. The development of the product is said to have reached a “fairly advanced stage”.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds FE 2’s Development Reportedly Reaches 'Advanced Stage'

description: Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) processors were unveiled by the chipmaker at MWC 2025. These new chips will power business computers, including laptops, desktops, and workstations. Featuring Intel's vPro branding, the Core Ultra 200V series is claimed to offer up to 20 hours of battery life and supports Microsoft's AI features on Windows 11, with a Copilot+ certification.
title: Intel Core Ultra (Series 2) Processors With vPro for Commercial PCs Launched at MWC 2025

description: Realme's P3 Pro packs plenty of fancy features, like a quad-curved display, a massive battery, and even an IP69 rating for dust and water resistance. It introduces some segment-leading features but comes up short in other areas, like camera quality, software, and raw performance, which are in some ways essential to the mid-range formula. However, its biggest problem is its competition.
title: Realme P3 Pro Review: A Good Upgrade That Fails to Stand Out

description: Sony has revealed a new limited edition DualSense wireless controller inspired by The Last of Us franchise. The controller, made in collaboration with Naughty Dog, features highlights and trophy icons from The Last of Us games and dual-tone design.
title: The Last of Us Limited Edition DualSense Controller Announced, Pre-Orders Go Live on March 14

description: Alibaba’s Qwen Team, a division tasked with developing artificial intelligence (AI) models, released the QwQ-32B AI model on Wednesday. It is a reasoning model based on extended test time compute with visible chain-of-thought (CoT). The developers claim that despite being smaller in size compared to the DeepSeek-R1, the model can match its performance based on benchmark scores.
title: Alibaba’s Qwen Team Releases QwQ-32B Open-Source Reasoning Model, Said to Perform Similar to DeepSeek-R1

description: Honor could be the latest company to offer a compact flagship phone, according to a new leak. The Chinese manufacturer is said to introduce a new phone with a small-sized screen. While the moniker of the purported handset is yet to be confirmed, it is speculated to be equipped with a 6.3-inch screen.
title: Honor Magic 7 Mini With a Compact 6.3-inch Screen Reportedly in Development

description: Realme P3 Ultra 5G will launch in India soon, the company announced on Friday. The design of the handset was teased in a promotional image. Previously, the phone was spotted on a popular benchmarking website which suggested several of its key expected features. The smartphone will join the Realme P3 Pro 5G and the Realme P3x 5G handsets.
title: Realme P3 Ultra 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Design Teased

description: Vivo Y300i 5G was recently spotted on a certification site suggesting several key specifications. The company has also announced the launch date of the handset in China. The design and colour options of the upcoming phone have been teased as well. They are in line with the design and colourways seen on the certification database.
title: Vivo Y300i 5G Launch Date Set for March 14; Design, Colourways Teased

description: 1Password has launched a new feature to simplify accessing passwords and codes based on location. The latest iOS and Android versions of 1Password now support adding location information to items. Relevant items will appear when users are in specific locations, and users can view item locations on a map.
title: 1Password Update Adds Ability to Add Locations to Items With Corresponding Map View

description: The overall crypto market cap tumbled by 4.10 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether joined majority altcoins on the loss-making side of the price charts on Friday, March 7. Only a few altcoins showed such as Leo and Iota showed minor gains on the charts.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin, Ether and Most Altcoins See Losses Owing to Market Volatility

description: Reddit on Thursday rolled out new tools for Redditors which makes it easier to check if their posts conflict with the community’s rules, help them recover it, and display the requirements for posting in communities. With the new Post Insights feature, they can get a comprehensive view of their post’s performance, with metrics such as views, upvotes, and shares. This rollout builds upon the recent introduction of an AI conversational chatbot dubbed Reddit Answers with which users can interact by asking text-based queries.
title: Reddit Rolls Out Post Insights for Performance Analysis, Community Suggestions and Other Tools

description: RoboCop: Rogue City, the first-person shooter from Teyon, is getting a standalone expansion later this year, publisher Nacon announced Thursday. RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business arrives Summer 2025 on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X.
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business Announced, Standalone Expansion Launches This Summer

description: This week brings a variety of OTT releases across genres. Nadaaniyan, starring Ibrahim Ali Khan, arrives on Netflix, while Ajith Kumar's action thriller VidaaMuyarchi debuts on the same platform. Daredevil: Born Again returns with Charlie Cox on JioHotstar, and Thandel, an emotional survival drama, lands on Netflix. Plus, investigative thriller Rekhachithram and historical series The Waking of a Nation drop on Sony LIV.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Mar 3 - Mar 9): Nadaaniyan, VidaaMuyarchi, Thandel, and More

description: Xiaomi 15 series launched globally earlier this week and will debut in India on March 11. While successors are months away, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has revealed details about the Xiaomi 16 Pro. The upcoming handset will feature a new component, according to the analyst, reducing weight and improving thermal performance.
title: Xiaomi 16 Pro to Feature 3D-Printed Metal Mid-Frame for Lower Weight, Better Thermal Performance: Ming-Chi Kuo

description: A refreshed version of Apple’s C1 modem is said to be in development which adds a key functionality missing from the current model, as per the claims by an industry analyst. Introduced with the debut of the iPhone 16e last month, it is the Cupertino-based technology giant’s first-ever proprietary cellular modem which potentially reduces the company’s dependency on Qualcomm. However, it is not without its caveats. A glance at the iPhone 16e’s specifications reveals that the phone lacks mmWave support due to this modem, but that may soon change.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing Refreshed C1 Modem With mmWave Support for iPhone

description: With the release of Android 15 QPR2 in December, Google brought back widgets to the lock screen on tablets, starting with the Pixel Tablet. Since then, everyone has been left wondering about the same happening for smartphones too, and it might be soon. As part of its Spotlight Week which brings an enhanced focus on widgets, the Mountain View-based technology company has announced that widgets on smartphones will finally arrive with the Android 16 QPR1 update.
title: Google Says Android 16 QPR1 Will Introduce Lock Screen Widgets on Smartphones

description: OpenAI is reportedly planning to release several artificial intelligence (AI) agents soon. As per the report, these AI agents will be specialised and have expertise in specific domains. Unlike most of the offerings by the company so far, these are said to not be part of its existing subscription tiers, and instead, the AI firm could offer them as standalone services.
title: OpenAI Could Reportedly Charge Up to $20,000 a Month for Expert-Level AI Agents

description: Realme 14 5G may soon join the Realme 14 Pro 5G and Realme 14 Pro+ 5G handsets, which were recently unveiled globally at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025. A new report has shared some key expected features of the purported smartphone. The colour options as well as the RAM and storage configurations of the vanilla Realme 14 5G have been tipped.
title: Realme 14 5G Tipped to Launch Globally Soon; RAM, Storage Configurations and Colour Options Leaked
